Description: For sale is a 2016 Gibson Les Paul Standard Limited Edition in a beautiful Torrified Birdseye Maple Honey Burst with original case. This instrument is in excellent condition and in perfect working order. There are some light scratches and a small clear coat impression on the head-stock from a clip on tuner. Overall, I would give it a solid 9.5 out of 10 condition. Everything on the guitar is original. There are no cracks, repairs, or major issues. The neck is straight with no issues. The original frets are in excellent condition with no wear. The original case works great. SPECS: Nut Width: 1.66" 1st Fret: 0.83" 12th Fret: 0.95" Neck Type: 50's Finger Board: Ironwood Pickups: 57 Classic / 57 Classic + Weight: 9lb 8oz If you scroll all the way down to the bottom of the pictures you can see detailed pictures of the frets, any wear on the guitar, and the guitar taken apart.
